<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>
        <code_url_2/>
        <details>For example, you may want to have a related list completed without having to click at the bottom.</details>
        <example_steps/>
        <example_url/>
        <module>e0b4d4b313892a00e5adbd522244b077</module>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001013</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function showMyForm(){
	var tableName = 'u_job_request';
	
	//Create and open the dialog form
	var dialog = new GlideDialogForm('Create Job Request', tableName); //Provide dialog title and table name
	dialog.setSysID(-1); //Pass in sys_id to edit existing record, -1 to create new record
	//   dialog.addParm('sysparm_view', 'ResolveDialog'); //Specify a form view
	dialog.addParm('sysparm_form_only', 'true'); //Add or remove related lists
	dialog.addParm('sysparm_collection','u_asrf'); //table the glidedialogform is being invoked from
	dialog.addParm('sysparm_collection_key','u_asrf'); //the field that has the reference back to the incident table
	dialog.addParm('sysparm_collectionID','ddc624877b467500c9b6b7793f4d4d99');// sys id of the incident record that we want to populate the u_task
	
	dialog.setSysID(sysID);
	
	dialog.render(); //Open the dialog
}</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>Have a form Pop Up for completion </short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 00:32:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6872d17b13012a00dd7db5b12244b051</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>

        <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 22:29:15</sys_updated_on>
        <tested_on_helsinki/>
    </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting>
</record_update>
